title: I Who Is a Loner, Using Cheats Adapts to the Dungeon - Novel Updates
tags: Ability Steal   Cheats   Dungeons   Eye Powers   Fairies   Game Elements   Gods   Level System   Loli   Loner Protagonist   Magic   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Monsters   Multiple Transported Individuals   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Skill Assimilation   Transported to Another World
author: Shēnshì   紳士
description:
I who have no friends was transported to the weird place with my classmates.

God who suddenly appeared in front of us said, “You all must complete the Dungeon!”

Protagonist who was given a cheat starts his adaptation to the dungeon

>
